description:
The school development facilities "Beach Chair (Extreme Makeover)" and "Animal Rides (Extreme Makeover)" are added.

Note: The facilities can be used after unlocking School Development at the Work Room.
Note: For details about content, please visit the official site.
Note: This product is a DLC set product for those who purchased the "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Digital Deluxe Edition" or "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Ultimate Edition".
name: Extreme School Makeover Kit
